Posts.Content: May 15, 2014 02:02AM lynn365 wrote: I can't say I know from experience about these types of wounds. I don't have breast cancer myself. My friend is going through radiation though and says that she feels much better when uses a cream than when she doesn't. Probably the soothing effect rather than a healing like the info above said. It was called Rescue from a company named Skinagain. I'm just glad something made her comfortable andÂ while her body did the healing.
